## Heading

This filter adds formatting to heading text.

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target-rx: "[0-9]*"

x <- 1:10
mean(x = 1:10)
```

It is also possible to specify custom formatting with the `style` tag:

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target:
#|      - "mean"
#|      - style:
#|            - "background-color: #FFC0CB;"

x <- 1:10
mean(x = 1:10)
```

This can be used to blank out code pieces for student exercises.

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target:
#|     - "mean"
#|     - style: "color: transparent;"

x <- 1:10
mean(x = 1:10)
```



Note that blanking out pieces with `style` means the answers are still visible in the underlying HTML.  To full replace the answers with placeholder space, use `mask`

```{r}
#| flourish:
#| - target:
#|     - "mean"
#|     - mask: true
#|     - style: "text-decoration: underline;"

x <- 1:10
mean(x = 1:10)
```
